titleStmt.title: Commune concilium tentum in camera Guild-hall, civitatis London, tricesimo primo Augusti, anno Regni Domini nostri, Jacobi nunc Regis, Angliæ, Franciæ, & Hibern. fidei defensor. &c. decimo nono Coram Francisco Jones milite, Majore Civitat. London, ... Forasmuch as the due execution of the place and office of constable hath of late beene more neglected then heretofore, ...
Acts & Orders. 1621-08-31
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Jones, Francis

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Robert Young, printer to the Honourable Citie of London,

notesStmt.note: Order regarding the election of constables. 31 Aug. 1621--STC.
Title from caption and opening words of text.
Steele notation: Con- to 2) allow- serue.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library, London, England.
